item.description:
Join Central CT Singles and hundreds of Local Singles Friday March 13 –8pm at the:

ST Patrick’s Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility

Dance the night away -meet some special and party with Central CT Singles

TICKET INCLUDES BUFFET!

Full Italian Buffet from Marco Polo’s famous menu including:

* Parmesan Chicken
* Specialty Pizza
* Pasta
* Salad
* Rolls

* Music from DJ Johnny *
* Prizes *

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 t0 Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)
(860) 236-3343

The Party starts at 8 pm

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE $$$ - Tickets are only $20

ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $30 CLICK HERE

Group Special - Buy 8 Tickets - Get 2 FREE (Save $30)

Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com CLICK HERE

http://www.CentralCTS...

http://singles.meetup...

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: ST Patricks Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant+Banquet Facility
